actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce (Subsequently: Commerce, Science, and Transportation)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce (Subsequently: Commerce, Science, and Transportation).
Pursuant to S. Res. 4, Committee name changed.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation discharged in Senate (Pursuant to S. Res. 4).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Rereferred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to assure the availability of natural gas in interstate commerce to essential agricultural uses.

summary.text: Natural Gas Agricultural Priority Act of 1977 - Amends the Natural Gas Act to direct the Federal Power Commission to prohibit the curtailment of adequate supplies of natural gas for essential agricultural purposes. Stipulates that the Secretary of Agriculture shall determine which agricultural-related purposes are essential.

titles.title: A bill to assure the availability of natural gas in interstate commerce to essential agricultural uses.
